A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Critics were paid off by Disney\, or they're afraid to anger the mouse. This is some of the worst writing I've ever seen in a film\, forcing all sorts of agenda over substance\, character development\, and story depth. It takes a steaming pile on the SAGA. The minorities this film attempts to put in the spotlight should be outraged by how cheaply their characters are treated. Kathleen Kennedy and Rian Johnson should not be allowed to work on Star Wars again.
